item.title: DevOps and SRE
item.description: Introduction: test When I embarked on my journey as a Cloud Engineer, I found myself surrounded by buzzwords. One question that frequently crossed everyone’s mind was: “What is the difference between SRE and DevOps?” This question led me down a rabbit hole in search of answers, prompting me to delve deeper into the concepts of SRE and DevOps. What is DevOps? DevOps, as the name suggests is a unification of “Development” and “Operations”.
